GlobalConfig.Name: Global Settings
GlobalConfig.Hint: Sets the modifications and lists for every user.

IndividualConfig.AllowedHint: Allow players to configure their systemmod settings individually

OneToOne.ConditionHelp: The result becomes the evaluated condition.  'Value' is the value of the source and can be used in the condition.

Lists.ExistsIfHelp: Checks for the existence of a non-empty value; if the value isn't empty, the data will be added.
Lists.SubKeyHelp: Can be used in place of key names in target values for modifications.  Use syntax of ${subKey} to replace value with sub key value.
Lists.InvalidKeyType: Invalid Key type; key must point to a collection key-value objects.

OneToOneModValue.ConditionHelp: The result becomes the evaluated condition.  'Value' is the value of the source and can be used in the condition.
OneToOneModValue.RawHelp: The result becomes the evaluated raw value.  'Value' is the value of the source and can be used in the raw value.

SYSTEMMOD.AreYouSure:
Are you sure you want to remove this {thing}?
This action cannot be undone.
SYSTEMMOD.DoYouWantTo: Are you sure you want to {action} this {thing}?

Error.FailedLoadingConfig: Config for {actor} failed to load! Error message: {error}
